website_summaries.verdict: A Coleman Airbed made especially for kids. Some owners liked it, but many complained about leaks.
pros: Antimicrobial sleep surface resists odor, mold, mildew, and fungus
Included 4D pump for easy inflation and deflation, outdoors or indoors
AirTight system is factory-tested to be leak-free
Double Lock valve is dual-sealed to be leak-free
cons: Contours are pronounced and force the back to arch
Problems with seals popping and beds deflating

customer_reviews.title: Deflated Every Night
customer_reviews.text: I brought this air mattress still in the box for a 4 day camping trip. After inflating it deflated and I attributed it to the "stretching out" that some air mattresses do. However the next morning the air mattress was half deflated. I inflated it every night before bed but it was half deflated by every morning. I'm disappointed. I usually get intex brand but I decided to try a Coleman this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: King mattress no good for a family of 4, doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this air mattress to work for our family, but it just did not. I am not an air mattress snob, I just wanted something that would blow up firm and hold air. The air mattress did not blow up firm, no matter how long I ran the pump. With myself, husband, 5 year old daughter and Infant, this air mattress was no good, aside from being low to the ground. I woke up about 25 times in the night to make sure the baby was ok, and by the morning my bottom was touching the ground.
customer_reviews.author: kmcg

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one week.
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it had to be fully fully fully inflated or it bounced my partner severely every time I twitched a muscle. Im 200 lbs & she''s 110. Bought for trip to Japan. Got here & it lasted one week, then began going flat in a couple of hours from fully inflated. No leak found with soapy water. Not worth money.
customer_reviews.author: dlkitchenjr

customer_reviews.title: I have had problems with cheaper ones like intex, so I got this as a spare ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with cheaper ones like intex, so I got this as a spare for use in our fold-up camper. I've used these for years both in tents and campers. Colemans have always seemed a little better than the cheaper brands. The price on this was better than what you'd see it for at a brick and mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Talone

customer_reviews.title: Great nights sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this quick bed for our summer camping trips in Colorado! Best night sleep he's had on a camping trip ever!! It was such a great bed I ordered one for myself! Great to have for unexpected extra overnight guests at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This bed does not stay inflated. I purchased it in June and finally after second use contacted Coleman. Their customer service is complicated. They are putting me through hoops for a replacement that I don't want. I already replaced item and want a credit . This is the second Coleman inflatable mattress that I have bought and the first I just threw away. They have refused to give me a refund for their defective merchandise even though I have only had it for 2 months. Read return policy and only buy Amazon direct merchandise. Amazon is very good about returns but Coleman is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sinisi

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It leaked at an internal seam. A leaky air mattress is useless. This was poorly made and is a flimsy piece of junk. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in our 2/3 person 3 season tent. Great for glamping and easy to fold up and compact! Recommend getting a pump that you can plug into your car to inflate. Set up in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fit my tent trailer bed perfectly. Remember, it's not leaking, just the rubber stretching, so it will feel as if it's going flat, but it's not. I will buy another for the other side. You do need a pump though, there is no valve to use with your mouth
customer_reviews.author: Bluejeep

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but it should last longer
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very comfortable and my husband and I both sleep well on it. However, I have only had it 6 months and already have a bulge in the mattress where something appears to have come loose
customer_reviews.author: Joyinlearning

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this product, very comfortable and easy to inflate and de-inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Giaramita

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I just used for guest purposes. After 3rd time of blowing it doesn’t blow air. I call the customer care they don’t even care . I was great like of Coleman products but it has turned me down
customer_reviews.author: Suptendu Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to fit under the cheap foam mattress in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to fit under the cheap foam mattress in my tent trailer. Now the foam keeps me warm and the air mattress under it keeps me comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Won't buyagain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this air mattress in August and it already leaks at the valve
customer_reviews.author: David DeVilliers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't the typical "KING" size. It really wasn't much bigger than the queen airbed I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This fits perfectly and it's quite easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We have a pop-up and the bed dimensions are not what you usually find at the stores. This fits perfectly and it's quite easy to use. We use them quite frequently when we go camping and even have our 3 dogs sleep on them.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these beds for my kids on a camping trip and they both did ok. It was hard to get the plug in and not lose some air pressure, but once I did they worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. K.

customer_reviews.title: ... this on our first camping trip and was very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Used this on our first camping trip and was very pleased with it, regardless of some of the negative reviews. More than big enough for both of us AND our dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and holds up well after repeated use
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were hoping for. Great quality, and holds up well after repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kooken

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves it when she stays over. Easy to fold.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not quite king size
customer_reviews.text: Planning to use as a spare bed for guests. Not quite king size but it will work. About 8-10 inches too short and a few inches short on width also when trying to use on a king box spring.

customer_reviews.title: Side by side these make a perfect king size bed
customer_reviews.text: Side by side these make a perfect king size bed. The 2 fit perfect in our tent so our grandson thinks it's a jumpy castle
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and store
customer_reviews.text: This is cool!! I have a pop up tent trailer and sleeping on the 3inch mattress pad in there hurts after a while. This has made sleeping in the woods fun again.
customer_reviews.author: onesoccerfan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but for no apparent reason within a month of ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but for no apparent reason within a month of use it started leaking air drastically and I had to return it. Had to put air in it every other night too.
customer_reviews.author: maryamsm

customer_reviews.title: nice bed, will fit our queen cot (mattress died
customer_reviews.text: nice bed, will fit our queen cot (mattress died :( ), we used directly on ground for first time, comfortable
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: Used these under our foam bunk mattress in the camper. What an awesome night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad.
customer_reviews.text: Shorter than the older Coleman blow up mattresses we have. Sturdy, but feet hang off.
customer_reviews.author: bcnewton50

customer_reviews.title: KING!
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find a king sized air mattress these days. I am grateful I was able to locate one.
customer_reviews.author: DallasTrek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Product was as describe! And arrived just in time for the holiday and visiting family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bed for a few nights of camping.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it worked great, and was quite comfortable. It needs to stretch out a bit so that it can be fuller, but that will come in time.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product with holes
customer_reviews.text: The last time I ever buy this brand. Came with holes to patch. I got an intex instead
customer_reviews.author: Mick Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are clear and packing it up was a snap. No real leaking from what we could tell.
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress does not have the wrap and roll system as pictured and described.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya D Glass

customer_reviews.title: easy to roll up for the size
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well, easy to roll up for the size.
customer_reviews.author: EAL

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I had this mattress for less than 2 weeks and it developed a leak at its seams.
customer_reviews.author: Puneet

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: needs a better fill valve. Lot of air leaks by the time you can get the plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. Carry bag would be better than the cover it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked very well for about 2 months then developed a
customer_reviews.text: worked very well for about 2 months then developed a leak
customer_reviews.author: ecmoll

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect travel bed for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect travel bed for our toddler. We already have a larger Coleman air matress and this works with the same pump.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Pawlowski

customer_reviews.title: The thinness of this is perfect for a horse trailer
customer_reviews.text: The thinness of this is perfect for a horse trailer. With 3 people sleeping on it though, it did lose a little air through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey B

customer_reviews.title: Not worth owning
customer_reviews.text: Air coils support does not exist. This should classified as an air mattress, not an air bed. I should have known by the price, it would be a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: Really good airbed.
customer_reviews.text: This bed really stays full of air. I'e been sleeping on it for several weeks. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Great air mattress. Just the right size to fit on top of a king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. As I have owned one prior to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. As I have owned one prior to purchase of these, I am very satisfied with these quality items.
customer_reviews.author: James Lupino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, filled with air fast, and was like sleeping on a regular bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good air mattress. Too bad these air mattresses only have a 4 year life span.
customer_reviews.author: FineArt Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than they used to be. Prefer the thicker one they used to make.
customer_reviews.author: Jami VanDelinder

customer_reviews.title: Longest Lasting Inflatable Bed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for an inflatable bed. In have purchased many brands and types over the years for camping and college. The Coleman beds are made higher quality than Intex and have lasted longer for close to the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Rik

customer_reviews.title: Coleman QuickBed
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if Coleman is using inferior material for their QuickBed but I am very disappointed in the product. I ordered a Quickbed on August 14, 2015 and also on October 13th. The mattress I just ordered does not stay inflated as was the problem with the previous one I ordered. You might want to check with Coleman to see why this problem is happening.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Steventon

customer_reviews.title: It's a comfortable mattress but made from cheap materials that don't hold ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered popped it's internal seams after the first few uses which created a large 12-inch-high lump in the middle of the mattress. Amazon quickly sent me out a replacement and 4 uses later it sprang a leak and deflates by itself after about an hour. All from normal, gentle use. It's a comfortable mattress but made from cheap materials that don't hold up for more than a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Body Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Yes i blv this item will suffice in the leisure of bed resting. Since being in an apartment, small as it is (within house), my purchasef item shall be comforting and greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: GRANNY 946

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to inflate by mouth
customer_reviews.text: It did the job; it was easy to inflate by mouth. It does get cold at night, it is best to put a blanket or two down on it. I have a difficult time putting it back in the attached bag.
customer_reviews.author: KD waloo

customer_reviews.title: Update: Mattress lasted two weeks
customer_reviews.text: These mattresses are great for camping. I purchased my last one in 2004 and have been using every year since. Just discovered it had a slow leak and decided it was time to let it go. They are very durable and with care will last for years. Update: this mattress lasted two weeks. Unrepairable. Terrible product. Avoid like the plague. Don't get caught out in the back country like I did with no mattress.
customer_reviews.author: LewTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: The bed doesn't hold air - we used it for ...
customer_reviews.text: The bed doesn't hold air - we used it for 10 nights and it should be pumped every night.
customer_reviews.author: Slava S

customer_reviews.title: would recommend a matress with greater width/depth it's just too thin
customer_reviews.text: ideally this would have held up better if there is more width to it. I attempted two of these matress' and both failed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress, it stayed inflated even after our son was using it as a bouncer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. Flimsy, but can do in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: N S

customer_reviews.title: The worst headaches I have had during the nights that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy. The worst headaches I have had during the nights that I had to sleep on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received NEW, in original packaging. I'll try it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received NEW, in original packaging. I'll try it out as soon as the weather permits, but a little too cold yet!
customer_reviews.author: Contessa H

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: This thing was absolutely terrible. The second night it was used, the dimples that are on the top and bottom separated resulting in a giant bubble the size of two king size pillows long and about 2 feet high. This completely rendered one side of the bed useless because you would just roll off the giant air bubble. Not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Wesley W. Hester

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, but developed a leak after several uses over a six month span.
customer_reviews.author: dolly

product_meta.title: Coleman QuickBed Single High Airbed
product_meta.description: Sleep soundly on a cot or just take up less floor space when you're resting on a Coleman QuickBed lite slim high airbed. The specially-designed shape fits easily on most cots. The soft top gives you added comfort and 27 comfort coils add extra support. Once you find that perfect firmness, it will be yours all night long with the Airtight system that's guaranteed not to leak and the easy-to-use Double Lock valve that also helps inflate and deflate the bed quickly. When you're ready to pack up, the built-in patented Wrap 'N' Roll storage system makes putting the bed away a matter of folding it, rolling it and storing it.
feature_bullets: Soft plush top creates a velvet-like sleep surface for more comfort
For use outdoors while camping or indoors as an extra bed
Approximate inflated dimensions: 73 x 38 x 8 in
AirTight system is factory-tested to be leak-free
Wrap 'N' Roll built-in storage system – just fold, roll and store
ComfortStrong coil system provides better support for all-night comfort
Double Lock valve is dual-sealed to be leak-free
Soft plush top creates a velvet-like sleep surface for more comfort
For use outdoors while camping or indoors as an extra bed
Approximate Inflated Dimensions: 73 x 38 x 8 in.
All Coleman airbed pumps recommended (sold separately)
